What's Tastytrade?

Tastytrade is a commission-free trading platform that provides an API for algorithmic trading. It offers:

  • Commission-free trading for stocks, ETFs, futures, and crypto
  • Advanced trading tools and analytics
  • Educational resources for traders of all levels

What can you trade with Tastytrade?

With Tastytrade, you can trade the following assets:

  • Stocks
  • ETFs
  • Futures
  • Crypto

Hedge trading is not available, only One-Way Mode is supported.

Credentials setup

Follow the steps below to link your Tastytrade account.

{% include 'include/warnings.html' with warning='Never share your credentials with anyone. Our platform uses industry-standard encryption to protect your credentials.' %}

1 Create an Tastytrade Account

Sign up for an Tastytrade account if you don't have one. Sign up here.

2 Get your client secret

  1. Log in to your Tastytrade account
  2. From the top navbar select "Manage"
  3. In the left sidebar, click on "Profile"
  4. Select the "API" from the profile options
  5. Click on "OAuth Applications" tab
  6. Click on "Create New Application" button if you don't have any existing application
  7. Fill in the application details as follows:
    • Application Name: Choose a name for your application (e.g., "Automate Trading App")
    • Scopes: Select the following scopes:
      • Read
      • Trade
      • OpenId
    • Redirect URI: Use the following URI: https://www.isalgo.com/automate/tastytrade/callback
  8. After filling in the details, click on "Finish" to create the application and obtain your Client Secret.
  9. If you have existing applications, click on "Manage" then "Settings" of the application you want to use
  10. Click on "Regenerate" to get a new Client Secret
  11. Copy your Client Secret for use in our platform

3 Get your refresh token

  1. In the OAth Applications tab, click on "Manage" then "Create Grant" of the application you want to use
  2. In the Scopes section, select the following scopes:
    • Read
    • Trade
    • OpenId
    And then click on "Create"
  3. Copy your refresh token for use in our platform

Complete Integration

Once you have your Client Secret and refresh token, return to our platform's Automate section to link your Tastytrade account. This will enable automated trading based on your TradingView alerts.
